Action: # Article XML Upload: Crossref 5.3.1
article_xml_upload/crossref_531
## Upload an XML file which does not meet the Crossref schema
Setup: You must be logged in using a pure publisher account (no other privileges)

Go to the "Upload Article XML" tab in the "Publisher Area"

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//publisher/uploadfile

Browse for a file under "Select a file" and select a file from your computer which is XML but not of the Crossref schema. You may use the file "schema_invalid.xml" from the Crossref folder in resources for this test.

Test Resource: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DOAJ/doaj/feature/4047-OPF/doajtest/xml_upload_test_package/Crossref/schema_invalid.xml
Choose "Crossref 5.3.1 XML" from "Format of the file" dropdown
Click "Upload"

Expected Test Results: A flash message appears at the top of the screen indicating an error has occurred

Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "processing failed" and a suitable entry in the "Notes" (you may need to reload the page). Check that the explanation link goes to a suitable reason and resolution for the problem.

Action: ## Upload a malformed XML file
Setup: You must be logged in using a pure publisher account (no other privileges)

Go to the "Upload Article XML" tab in the "Publisher Area"

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//publisher/uploadfile

Browse for a file under "Select a file" and select a file from your computer which is XML but not of the Crossref schema. You may use the file "schema_invalid.xml" from the Crossref folder in resources for this test. You may use the file "not_xml.xml" from the Crossref folder in resources for this test.

Test Resource: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DOAJ/doaj/feature/4047-OPF/doajtest/xml_upload_test_package/Crossref/not_xml.xml
Choose "Crossref 5.3.1 XML" from "Format of the file" dropdown
Click "Upload"

Expected Test Results: A flash message appears at the top of the screen indicating an error has occurred

Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "processing failed" and a suitable entry in the "Notes" (you may need to reload the page). Check that the explanation link goes to a suitable reason and resolution for the problem.

Action: ## Upload a file with duplicates inside the file
Setup: Ensure that the publisher account owns a journal with Print ISSN "1111-1111" and E-ISSN "2222-2222", and these are not attached to any other journals.
Setup: You must be logged in using a pure publisher account (no other privileges)

Go to the "Upload Article XML" tab in the "Publisher Area"

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//publisher/uploadfile

Browse for a file under "Select a file" and select the test resource file "duplicate_in_file.xml" from the Crossref 5.3.1 resources

Test Resource: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DOAJ/doaj/feature/4047-OPF/doajtest/xml_upload_test_package/Crossref/5.3.1/duplicate_in_file.xml
Choose "Crossref 5.3.1 XML" from "Format of the file" dropdown
Click "Upload"

Expected Test Results: A flash message appears at the top of the screen indicating a successful upload
Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "pending"

Action: wait a short amount of time for the job to process, then reload the page (do not re-submit the form data). If the job remains in "pending", reload the page until the status changes.

Expected Test Results: Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "processing failed" and a suitable entry in the "Notes".  Check that the explanation link goes to a suitable reason and resolution for the problem.

Action: ## Upload a file containing ISSNs the publisher does not own

Setup: Ensure that the ISSNs 0000-0002 and 0000-000X are in DOAJ attached to one or more journals (e.g. one with 0000-000X AND 0000-0002 or two, one with 0000-0002 and another with 0000-000X).  None of the journals with these ISSNs should be owned by the publisher
Setup: You must be logged in using a pure publisher account (no other privileges)

Go to the "Upload Article XML" tab in the "Publisher Area"

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//publisher/uploadfile

Browse for a file under "Select a file" and select the test resource file "unowned_issn.xml" from the Crossref 5.3.1 resources

Test Resource: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DOAJ/doaj/feature/4047-OPF/doajtest/xml_upload_test_package/Crossref/5.3.1/unowned_issn.xml
Choose "Crossref 5.3.1 XML" from "Format of the file" dropdown
Click "Upload"

Expected Test Results: A flash message appears at the top of the screen indicating a successful upload
Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "pending"

Action: wait a short amount of time for the job to process, then reload the page (do not re-submit the form data). If the job remains in "pending", reload the page until the status changes.

Expected Test Results: Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "processing failed" and a suitable entry in the "Notes".  Check that the explanation link goes to a suitable reason and resolution for the problem.

Action: click on "(show error details)" for the record in the "History of uploads"

Expected Test Results: Additional error details are shown, indicating that the publisher does not own ISSNs "0000-0002" and "0000-000X"

Action: ## Upload a file containing ISSNs not previously seen in DOAJ
Setup: Ensure that the ISSN "1111-1111" is attached to a journal owned by the publisher and ISSN "5555-5555" is not present in any journal in DOAJ.

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//publisher/uploadfile

Expected Test Results: A flash message appears at the top of the screen indicating a successful upload
Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "pending"

Action: wait a short amount of time for the job to process, then reload the page (do not re-submit the form data). If the job remains in "pending", reload the page until the status changes.

Expected Test Results: Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "processing failed" and a suitable entry in the "Notes".  Check that the explanation link goes to a suitable reason and resolution for the problem.

Action: click on "(show error details)" for the record in the "History of uploads"

Expected Test Results: Additional error details are shown, indicating that the ISSN "5555-5555" does not appear in DOAJ.

Action: ## Upload a file containing ISSNs erroneously shared with another account
Setup: Ensure that the ISSN "1111-1111" is attached a journal owned by the publisher and ISSN "2222-2222" is attached to the same journal and also to another journal not owned by the publisher
Setup: You must be logged in using a pure publisher account (no other privileges)

Go to the "Upload Article XML" tab in the "Publisher Area"

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//publisher/uploadfile

Click "Upload"

Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "pending"

Action: wait a short amount of time for the job to process, then reload the page (do not re-submit the form data). If the job remains in "pending", reload the page until the status changes.

Expected Test Results: Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "processing failed" and a suitable entry in the "Notes".  Check that the explanation link goes to a suitable reason and resolution for the problem.

Action: click on "(show error details)" for the record in the "History of uploads"

Expected Test Results: Additional error details are shown, indicating that the ISSN "2222-2222" is shared with another user

Action: ## Successfully upload a file containing a new article

Setup: Ensure that the publisher account owns a journal with Print ISSN "1111-1111" and E-ISSN "2222-2222", and these are not attached to any other journals and that this journal does not contain "Success" or "Update" articles from previous tests (delete them via the admin interface if they do).
Setup: You must be logged in using a pure publisher account (no other privileges)

Go to the "Upload Article XML" tab in the "Publisher Area"

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//publisher/uploadfile

Browse for a file under "Select a file" and select the test resource file "successful.xml" from the Crossref 5.3.1 resources

Test Resource: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DOAJ/doaj/feature/4047-OPF/doajtest/xml_upload_test_package/Crossref/5.3.1/successful.xml
Choose "Crossref 5.3.1 XML" from "Format of the file" dropdown
Click "Upload"

Expected Test Results: A flash message appears at the top of the screen indicating a successful upload
Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "pending"

Action: wait a short amount of time for the job to process, then reload the page (do not re-submit the form data). If the job remains in "pending", reload the page until the status changes.

Expected Test Results: Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "successfully processed", and the Note "1 articles imported (1 new, 0 updated)"

Action:
Go to the Table of Contents for the journal (e.g. by going to /toc/2222-2222), and go to the Articles tab

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//toc/2222-2222

Expected Test Results: The list of articles should contain an article with the title "Success!"

Action: ## Successfully upload a file containing an updated article
Setup: Run through the previous test to upload a new article
Setup: You must be logged in using a pure publisher account (no other privileges)

Go to the "Upload Article XML" tab in the "Publisher Area"

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//publisher/uploadfile

Browse for a file under "Select a file" and select the test resource file "update.xml" from the Crossref 5.3.1 resources

Test Resource: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DOAJ/doaj/feature/4047-OPF/doajtest/xml_upload_test_package/Crossref/5.3.1/update.xml
Choose "Crossref 5.3.1 XML" from "Format of the file" dropdown
Click "Upload"

Expected Test Results: A flash message appears at the top of the screen indicating a successful upload
Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "pending"

Action: wait a short amount of time for the job to process, then reload the page (do not re-submit the form data). If the job remains in "pending", reload the page until the status changes.

Expected Test Results: Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "successfully processed", and the Note "1 articles imported (0 new, 1 updated)"

Action:
Go to the Table of Contents for the journal (e.g. by going to /toc/2222-2222), and go to the Articles tab

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//toc/2222-2222

Expected Test Results: The list of articles should contain an article with the title "Updated!", and the previous version ("Success!") should be gone

Action: ## Successfully upload a file by reference containing a new or updated article
Setup: You must be logged in using a pure publisher account (no other privileges)

Go to the "Upload Article XML" tab in the "Publisher Area"

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//publisher/uploadfile

In the box "Provide a URL where we can download the XML", enter the URL below

Test Resource: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DOAJ/doaj/feature/4047-OPF/doajtest/xml_upload_test_package/Crossref/5.3.1/successful.xml
Choose "Crossref 5.3.1 XML" from "Format of the file" dropdown
Click "Upload"

Expected Test Results: A flash message appears at the top of the screen indicating that the file reference was successfully received
Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "pending"

Action: wait a short amount of time for the job to process, then reload the page (do not re-submit the form data). If the job remains in "pending", reload the page until the status changes.

Expected Test Results: Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "successfully processed", and the Note "1 articles imported (0 new, 1 updated)" (if you have prevously imported the successful.xml file in previous tests.

Action:
Go to the Table of Contents for the journal (e.g. by going to /toc/2222-2222), and go to the Articles tab

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//toc/2222-2222

Expected Test Results: The list of articles should contain an article with the title "Success!"

Action: ## Successfully upload a file containing article with html tag in title

Setup: Ensure that the publisher account owns a journal with Print ISSN "1111-1111" and E-ISSN "2222-2222", and these are not attached to any other journals and that this journal does not contain "Success" or "Update" articles from previous tests (delete them via the admin interface if they do).
Setup: You must be logged in using a pure publisher account (no other privileges)

Browse for a file under "Select a file" and select the test resource file "title_with_html_tags.xml" from the Crossref 5.3.1 resources

Test Resource: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DOAJ/doaj/feature/4047-OPF/doajtest/xml_upload_test_package/Crossref/5.3.1/title_with_html_tags.xml
Choose "Crossref 5.3.1 XML" from "Format of the file" dropdown
Click "Upload"

Expected Test Results: A flash message appears at the top of the screen indicating that the file reference was successfully received
Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "pending"

Action: wait a short amount of time for the job to process, then reload the page (do not re-submit the form data). If the job remains in "pending", reload the page until the status changes.

Expected Test Results: Your file is shown in the "History of uploads" with status "successfully processed", and the Note "1 articles imported (1 new, 0 updated)"

Action:
Go to the Table of Contents for the journal (e.g. by going to /toc/2222-2222), and go to the Articles tab

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//toc/2222-2222

Expected Test Results: The list of articles should contain an article with the title "Title with HTML tags escaped and <i>unescaped</i>"
